CustomBehavior.Text: Azenius Questing Profiles (Outland = Terokkar Forest - The Aldor Profile Loaded).
Compiling Quests.
Turning off auto-train.
Setting UseFlightPaths to false.
Setting LearnFlightPaths to true.
Setting LootMobs to true.
Setting UseMount to true.
Setting PullDistance to 30.
Flying to 'Haggard War Veteran' (Picking up Quest = A'dal).

CustomBehavior.DestName: Flying to 'Haggard War Veteran' (Picking up Quest = A'dal).

CustomBehavior.Text: Picking up Quest = A'dal.
Flying to 'A'dal' (Turning Quest = A'dal).
Turning in Quest = A'dal.
Picking up Quest = City of Light.
Dismounting to avoid navigation issues if you happen to be on your flying mount.
Following our guide through the city. (Escorting Quest = City of Light).

CustomBehavior.Lua: i=GetQuestLogIndexByID(10211) a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,j=GetQuestLogTitle(i) if g==-1 then SelectQuestLogEntry(i) SetAbandonQuest(i) AbandonQuest(i) end
